description: Create a new user credential classification
permissions: Admins can create user credential classifications; non-admins can create them for organizations they are members of.
validation_notes: --name, --organization-type, and --organization-id are required. Name must be unique within the organization. External ID, if provided, must be unique within the organization. Organization type must be one of Broker, Customer, Trucker, MaterialSupplier, Developer.

flags.name: --external-id
flags.validation: If provided, must be unique within the organization.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: Must be unique within the organization.

flags.name: --organization-type
flags.validation: Must be one of Broker, Customer, Trucker, MaterialSupplier, Developer.
